Title: Relates to the confidentiality and expungement of records in juvenile delinquency cases in the family court
Summary: Relates to the confidentiality and expungement of records in juvenile delinquency cases in the family court; requires certain records to be expunged automatically.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to the confidentiality and expungement of records in juvenile delinquency cases in the family court
